## Description {#details}

Common base class for all memory intrinsics.

Simply provides common methods. Written as CRTP to avoid a common base class amongst the three atomicity hierarchies.

Definition at line 970 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/intrinsicinst-h">IntrinsicInst.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### getDest() {#a44f399ae5b08171d0b9886d0a27a582a}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename Derived&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>Value &#42; llvm::MemIntrinsicBase&lt; Derived &gt;::getDest () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
This is just like getRawDest, but it strips off any cast instructions (including addrspacecast) that feed it, giving the original input.

The returned value is guaranteed to be a pointer.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/intrinsicinst-h/#l00990">990</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/intrinsicinst-h">IntrinsicInst.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
